changeSet.comment: Extra two columns for receipt table

changeSet.author: yegor@tpc2.com
changeSet.sql: CREATE FUNCTION balance(urn VARCHAR(120)) RETURNS INTEGER AS $$ SELECT CASE WHEN dt = $1 THEN dtbalance ELSE ctbalance END FROM receipt WHERE dt = $1 OR ct = $1 LIMIT 1 $$ LANGUAGE SQL

changeSet.author: yegor@tpc2.com
changeSet.comment: Trigger to update balance on every INSERT into receipt
changeSet.sql: CREATE TRIGGER preset_balance_trigger BEFORE INSERT ON receipt FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE preset_balance();
